timeline.bodyText:
There is no need for this method.
ProjectExt.getProject(target); already does the target instanceof Project check 😉
timeline.author: sandupostaru

timeline.bodyText:
I think there might be a better way to do this.
I updated the original ticket with the details and some images 😉
timeline.author: sandupostaru

timeline.bodyText: You iterate directly by using a index on the model.getAllLibraries() in order to avoid a O(n^2) complexity.
timeline.author: sandupostaru

timeline.bodyText: Instead of iterating on items and checking if it is contained in itemsToBeItalicAndRed, can we iterate directly on itemsToBeItalicAndRed? Is there a case where items in itemsToBeItalicAndRed would not appear in the items collection ?
timeline.author: sandupostaru

timeline.bodyText: We can return identifier instanceof ModelIdentifier && ((ModelIdentifier) identifier).isProxy() (Sonar Rule)
timeline.author: sandupostaru
sandupostaru
